Nice to finally meet you.

Welcome to my little corner of the internet. As a life-long creator, I’ve been lucky to turn the thing I love into the thing that fills my fridge and pays the bills!

I’ve been very fortunate to have worked with a wide range of clients big and small, across industries and countries. Throughout these experiences I’ve developed a broad skill-set and an appreciation for top quality, concept-driven design. Fundamentally my passion lies in collaborating with interesting people and teams to create joyful and innovative design solutions.

Case studies
Digital case study

Nikon: Home

Working with Nikon and Secret Escapes the brief was to develop an online marketing campaign promoting Nikon's new camera through the lens of travel and photography. We created a short film series following two professional photographers from around the world who meet in each others home countries to try to capture ‘the perfect shot.’

Print case study

Saleyards Rd

We were handed an amazing brief and opportunity from national meat wholesaler, Wilson Hellaby -- to design and activate their new high-end brand: Saleyards Road. The brand was built to take premium angus beef to the market; especially high-end butcher marketplaces and elite restaurants, who offer the highest level of dining experience.

Art direction case study

Religion Tequila

It was a pleasure to work with Religion Tequila from its inception. We collaborated tightly with the client to develop their rich brand concept into a strong visual system to launch. Core to this were the six hero artworks which were art directed and highly edited to represent either good or evil, and to be paired with a Religion Tequila product.

Branding case study

Secret Escapes

I joined the marketing team with a clear goal to unify the design across all channels, to strengthen Secret Escapes brand recognition, and enable higher quality output across departments.

Web development case study

Line 7 Frontier

To support the launch of new brand Line 7 Frontier, I was briefed to develop a design system to run across print and online, and to develop a comprehensive online experience to take users on a journey to discover the Frontier brand, capped off with an immersive e-commerce experience.

Packaging case study

Jimbos

Large New Zealand petfood manufacturer, Jimbo’s set the challenge to launch a new line of frozen dog foods into a competitive market, while aligning and enhancing their existing brand identity in the wider category. The work here went on to guide design choices across the Jimbo's product family.
